frame.name: Impression
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes the <fen>Impression</fen> which a <fen>Figure</fen>, which can be a person, an organization, or an object, leaves with an <fen>Audience</fen>. The <fen>Audience</fen> is often left unstated when it represents anyone who is aware of the subject. The <fen>Impression</fen> may be describe with a <fen>Descriptor</fen>; the effectiveness of the <fen>Impression</fen> may be provided by <fen>Degree</fen>. The <fen>Context</fen> indicates the domain in which the <fen>Impression</fen> is understood.
<ex><fex name="Figure">He</fex> <gov>had</gov> an extremely <fex name="Descriptor">fragile</fex> <fex name="Audience">self</fex> - <t><fex name="Impression">image</fex></t></ex>
<ex><fex name="Audience">My</fex> <fex name="Impression">impression</fex> <fex name="Figure">of the show</fex> was just the opposite</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Figure
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity (a person, organization, product, or event) for which the <fen>Audience</fen> has an <fen>Impression</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Figure">He</fex> projects a mysterious <t>persona</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Audience
FE.definition:
<def-root>A person or group of people who have an <fen>Impression</fen> of a <fen>Figure</fen>.
<ex>His <fex name="Audience">public</fex> <t>image</t> is flawless</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The effect of the <fen>Impression</fen> left on the Audience.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The effectiveness of the <fen>Impression</fen> on the Audience.</def-root>

FE.name: Context
FE.definition: <def-root>A spatial, cultural, or personal delimitation within which a <fen>Figure</fen> leaves an <fen>Impression</fen> on an <fen>Audience</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Impression
FE.definition: <def-root>A generalized conception of a <fen>Figure</fen> presented to or shared by an <fen>Audience</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: image.n
lexUnit.definition: An impression that a person has of something or someone

lexUnit.name: persona.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a personality one assumes in a certain context
